amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt any rule that relates to food safety, workplace safety, consumer products safety, and air or water quality from the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 112-296 to exempt from the bill any rule that relates to food safety, workplace safety, consumer products safety, air or water quality.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 248 (Roll no. 875).
